original_title: Perón: actualización política y doctrinaria para la toma del poder
overview: A series of interviews with Juan Domingo Perón in Madrid, where he was exiled. Filmed between June and October 1971, Perón talks about the current situation of the Justicialist movement and the steps to be taken to win the presidential elections again.
title: Perón: actualización política y doctrinaria para la toma del poder
